mapper.insert: insert into physical(id,`type`,code,num,network_id,`name`,enterprise_id) values (#{id},#{type},#{code},#{num},#{network_id},#{name},#{enterprise_id}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `type`=#{type},code=#{code},num=#{code},network_id=#{network_id},`name`=#{name},enterprise_id=#{enterprise_id}

insert into physical_channel_binding(id,physical_id,channel_code,channel_type_id,collect_id) values (#{id},#{physical_id},#{channel_code},#{channel_type_id},#{collect_id}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE channel_type_id=#{channel_type_id},collect_id=#{collect_id}
